info.author: Minh-Tri Pham
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description: ctypes-opencv is a package that brings Intel's (now Willow Garage's) Open Source Computer Vision Library (OpenCV) to Python. OpenCV is a collection of algorithms and sample code for various computer vision problems. The goal of ctypes-opencv is to provide Python access to all documented functionality of OpenCV.
info.name: ctypes-opencv
info.summary: ctypes-opencv - A Python wrapper for OpenCV using ctypes
info.html_description: ctypes-opencv is a package that brings Intel’s (now Willow Garage’s) Open Source Computer Vision Library (OpenCV) to Python. OpenCV is a collection of algorithms and sample code for various computer vision problems. The goal of ctypes-opencv is to provide Python access to all documented functionality of OpenCV.
